children.text:
The position z was part of the correct if z < C. 

Now, after the cnt is C-1, the correct now counts icons less than C-1. So if z was less than C but >= C-1, then it was part of the previous correct (since z < C), but now it's not part of the new correct (since z >= C-1). So removing it would decrease correct by 1.
